text: Tabe ki allah chara ami an'yake bicaraka khujambo yakhana tini'i se'ijana yini tomadera kache abatarana karechena e kitaba, bisadabhabe byakhyakrta?â€™â€™ Ara yadera amara grantha diyechilama tara jane ye eti abatirna hayeche tomara prabhura nikata theke satyera sathe, ata'eba tumi sandihanadera antarbhukta hayo na.
